name: Associacao 31
description: Where I learned to share, play with others, and follow instructions. I also developed my social, emotional, and cognitive skills.

name: Colegio Moderno de S. Jose
description: Here I learned to read, write, and do math. I also developed my critical thinking and problem-solving skills. I learned to love learning and to be curious about the world around me.

name: Colegio Nossa Senhora da Boavista
description: When I prepared for the challenges of high school and beyond. I developed my academic skills in a variety of subjects. I also explored my interests and talents.

name: Escola Camilo Castelo Branco
description: This was where I prepared for college and careers. I developed my academic and critical thinking skills. I gained a foundation in a variety of subjects.

name: Universidade do Minho
description: Where I started to gain a broad education in my chosen field of study. I prepared for a career in my field and developed my critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

name: Faculdade de Engenharia da Universidade do Porto
description: Here I gained specialized knowledge in my chosen field of study. I prepared for a career in research or teaching and developed my independent research skills.
